messages.text: "Aja will you be able to find a time?"
"Can you invite DC Davis, Tina Jones, and Pete Simpson to the noon fifteen call "
"Liked ‚ÄúCan you invite DC Davis, Tina Jones, and Pete Simpson to the noon fifteen call ‚Äù"
"I've talking points are finalized can you send to me? Just want a printed copy here in office in case something happens to MTW's on his way in "
"I haven't heard from Nicole or anyone"
"Would print out and I'll text you if there's a better version "
"Liked ‚ÄúWould print out and I'll text you if there's a better version ‚Äù"
"Ok. Once you review and finalize just send to me to print. TY"
"He might've also printed it out at his place"
"Liked ‚ÄúHe might've also printed it out at his place‚Äù"
"Can you let me know when he arrives "
"Ok to share the order with Manny? "
"Tracy says she might need to revise it"
"Eileen, mayor wants to do KATU Interview this evening. Can we do 6:30? Hoping to schedule leadership before that.       "
"Aja can we schedule some prep time for the mayor before his zoom "
"Aja 2 pm tomorrow for meet the press work? Mayor is üëçüèª"
"His day looks crazy tomorrow. Is there another day next week that works better"
"Aja -- 8:30 am not 10 am üëçüèª(just saw calendar invite)"
"E- I would like to schedule Helen Jung at the end of day today. Thoughts? "
"Aja will need15 min prep right before "
"Aja, getting pressed from KATU about their townhall. Let me know if I should just tell them no "
"I thought I said yes, as long as POC voices are elevated in the conversations "
"This is our third tv town hall request "
"He has a call with the chair"
"Do you have a cell# for Heidi Brown in the CAO?"
"Were you still going to text Alex Z?"
"I just got off the phone with her"
"üëç Adele's folo: Is he OK? Are they Ok? Can I just say yes?"
"'Adele, I have to respect the Mayor's privacy. That's his family's business.'"
"Everton folo: At this point is it clear when he'll be returning to Portland?"
"Parx -- so sorry! Didn't take phone to bed with me and woke up this morning to all this. Totally at your disposal the rest of the weekend. Let me know what you need done."
"Let me get through this presser and will fill you in!"
"Tim can you transcribe what MTW says verbatim"
"Can you forward me what you responded to brad with about enforcement "
"      The City is not interested in citing people who are going about their business, causing no harm, and uninvolved in criminal conduct.    "
"Using my work phone for zoom so trying to free up a line"
"Tracy Reeve... but I want to explain set up."
"I saw Aaron's and Rachel's follow from WW"
"Rachel doubled back saying ' can you confirm statement? You didn't answer my question. "
"Can you please amplify PPB tweet about media?"
"Can you ask Tina to confirm the chief speaking tomorrow at our press conference "
"You   Mayor   PPB Chief   PFR   PBEM Myers    "
"Maybe a commissioner - if so, after mayor "
"Tim, I'm going to go on a leadership call at midnight, then going to sleep. Will be up by 5 am to finalize MTW's TPs and everything else "
"How much longer are you going to be at the JIC? Please get rest "
"Make be two more hours. Want to get some numbers"
"One fix to add to your edits to TPs... per Tina. Change law enforcement professionals to public safety professionals... to include fire, etc"
"Tim, you're a rockstar. Thank you. I am working with Nicole on the Mayor's afternoon conference TPs. You don't have to take that on "
"FYI.. at some point MTW needs to be briefed on what the Natl G deployment looks like. As in, facility security duty."
"PPB... Jami, Tina, Capt. Dobson??? Not sure. "
"Tim can you call assignment editors and ask if they are coming to the 1:30,"
"Is Adam away from the presser yet? Don't want to bug him if he's busy."
"Tim, have any ideas on who else should speak at our presser tomorrow?"
"So it's in for sure? Last Check-in with JIC, outcome was pending. Tina's ready with someone... who ever that may be. "
"Yes it will be every day until rioting is overblown"

"Depends what happens. If the Laurelhurst issue explodes, maybe a rep. From the district? Kinda late to track down. In the end MTW Andy Davis suffice. It's more like an availability than sharing new info ."
"Tim can you draft a press release "
"Sure. Same time and location. Rod just MTW and Davis? Did you watch MSNBC? Thought he did good. Able to use material from the community press conference,"
"I may need you to call all stations saying the mayor needs to talk "
"Ok. Want to review basic pr. Chief is about to visit with some protesters "
"Sheriff Reese might be joining. I'll let you know "
"MTW might make changes but it's the latest version "
"I'll let you know if there are more "
"What about Reese? No go for sure, or still pending?"
" I just spoke with Chris. Sounds like yes."
"Robert says US ATT billy Williams may want to talk ."
"Any possibility about doing second half hour ... Bn 12:30 and 1? They're asking. I said probably not, but said I'd check "
"Is the PPB touchbase at 2 pm still on? Do you know?"
"ABC GMA asking for MTW at4:30pst tomorrow. "
"Parx -- what are the chances of taking the rest of the day off Wednesday after moderating the daily presser? Just askin! Mrs. just got it off."
"Mayor will be late to prep. I'll prep him with Heidi -- no need to join "
"Bex can you craft a press release for tomorrow's presser"
"You    Mayor   Chief   Boone   Rachel Banks (county)    QA"
"Excellent. Will send draft for review shortly . Been in a pissing match with RM via email about clarification.., "
"I will, but am satisfied with some movement. "
"Who's drafting TPs for MTW for  the presser?"
"Laura did. I'm reviewing tomorrow in the AM"
"Remind me tomorrow that I need to set you up for all of TW's social."
"I'm on vacation Friday to next Friday "
"Nice!! You've earned it, and about half of those SHOULD be comp days. Is JP back this week?"
"Hope media see the note about it being 8:30 this time "
"KGW is asking for a call in number. How do we usually do that? I can include that in a reminder advisory that also reiterated the time...,"
"We just use a conference line number they can dial in, and you talk to everyone before set the rules and call out their name one by one for Q and A (make a list before hand of who has a question)"
"Ask PIOs if you can borrow one of their conference lines (pin required) "
"Right. Was just wondering if we had a go to line. I'll call pics."
"Tim can you tell the JIC team I am sending them an all city email soon "
"Did you see KGW's ask for a 6:45 am hit tomorrow?"
"Same updated press release? City leaders... etc ? Dates changed but same time... I'll forward draft soon for approval. "
"Tim before you leave can you send out a press release saying tomorrow's will be at 12:00 and for media to note the time change "
"FYI , Lauren Drake OPB may reach out. She's been pestering me. Told her to shoot you a note."
"Parx-- can you make sure the Mayor knows about the time change??"
"ROS for today? Anyone besides MTW and DC Davis?"
"I know you're busy but any updates on ROS? I have a couple outlets asking."
"Parkrose super might join -- maybe a DD board chair "
"Careful with at least DD board chair. They're sounding a bit edgy .. threatening to 'end all ties with police, trying, education programs, etc. Just an FYI "
"Get clarification to see if they are speaking or just supporting "
"Unless you know? I asked Nic to get that clarification "
"I had no idea about their nexus to the presser. Learned that from you. Who are they talking to?"
"She's coming but knows she's not part of the ROS "
"The George Floyd memorial is still going on"
"Just start the presser at 1:05 just to be safe -- no announcement necessary "
"Tim can you tell media there you will start as soon as memorial is over privately "
"And when you get up explain I'm at the podium that we delayed for the memorial "
"They're about to do benediction to close "
"Need another authentication code. Tried merging accounts but lost MTW. "
"Natasha H. Is the only one I know. Robert will know the other two. He's on a call at the moment."
"Tim standby on press release don't send yet "
"I'll hold til things start... just because. I like your added graf at the bottom. Thank you. I'll inform the JIC, Tina, etc. about the scheduling (no weekend planned)."
"I'll hold til things start... just because. I like your added graf at the bottom. Thank you. I'll inform the JIC, Tina, etc. about the scheduling (no weekend planned)."
"Want me in on the 6 pm KGW prep? "
"Bex, did you get my handover document?"
"The email??? Yes I did. Got it."
"FYI:  I'm not going to be in any meetings. I'm just on call and monitoring email and helping with messaging. "
"Got it. Get some downtime please. Mojitos and whatever.ü•§"
"There's an ask from leadership meeting to bring back Dr Smith and have her open today's presser with high level reflection on Portland protests . Thoughts? I kinda like it."
"Sure. It's really last minute to ask."
"But I will send her an email "
"I know. Thanks. She does want to be involved more in messaging "
"Tim give me a buzz when you get a chance "
"Not sure if it's still in there but leadership agreed that Damien should be pulled out of the TPs "
"FYI heading for home. Will be online there when I arrive."
"Please work on logistics including looping Adam in -- I will work on messaging"
"Please join zoom meeting now if you can "
"Gotta fire up the computer. Be there soon"
"'Yielded to demands' is inaccurate if he means PPS. "
"At the store now but will do soon"
"Checking on statement . Are you eventually sharing with media."
"MTW has it now -- Sonia is going to send us the final draft soon "
"Regarding the pushback and 'yielded to demands' ... it reads to me as yielded to comm. Hardesty.  Didn't our office originate the initiative to pull SROs? I know Jo Ann has been vocal, but..."
"Just because the story refers to 'three school districts'. I'll check with Sonia."
"About to jump on a call in 5 min. Have time to talk at 4:20/4:30?"
"Just tried calling. Now good? Just got off my meeting early!"
"Tina is suggesting a joint statewide re Minneapolis "
"Who is crafting? Need me to? You or someone on leadership want to take the first draft "
"Can you take a stab at it? Tina said she can assist "
"Let me know when you have a min "
"I'll call you back - on a call"
"I think it's worth having the three of us on the phone "
"K. Can you give me a call when you're off"
"And under a time crunch. That was extraordinary"
"Tim is going to transcribe so we can capture it "
"Morning! 10 am still ok for draft TPs? üôèüèª"
"Spoke with Jamal. Says you're making changes. MTW requests no backtracking. Please let me know when your edits are done. "
"And deleted one thing I had before "
"Powerful speech. Sent an email with a tweet I drafted from your words. Please reply all with any edits "
"Liked ‚ÄúPowerful speech. Sent an email with a tweet I drafted from your words. Please reply all with any edits ‚Äù"
"Any word from Heidi on what we can and cannot day "
"Spoke with Tia about her recommended approach to #BlackOutTuesday. I'm fine with it, no objection"
"She's coming up with potential language for a Facebook posts and tweets"
"I googled how to use one drive! "
"Question. If edits are made, are they directly made in the document on my computer too?"
"Loved ‚ÄúI googled how to use one drive! ‚Äù"
"Nerd update: it does change your doc on your desktop too "
"Parkrose Super is trying to move things around so he can attend "
"DD super is a maybe, but I believe the board chais can attend "
"I don't know. Did you invite them to attend or speak?"
"I invited them to the press conference "
"Can you clarify if they are speaking or just supporting "
"She's 15 min from city hall. She's gonna attend anyway but she knows she's not part of the agenda "
"Nic let me know if we have any new announcements to make tomorrow "

"We're keeping it general. Don't think it makes sense to offer smaller proposals -- ppl will slam us for not going far enough. I will draft some language for next steps; we'll be able to offer a suite of options next week "

"From City of Portland Benefits: Open Enrollment ends this Friday June 5th. This is your opportunity to change plans, add/drop dependents, and elect a Healthcare or Dependent Care FSA. Go to slkt.io/6N9P, or download the BenefitFocus mobile app (use company ID: citybenefits). Question? Email benefits@portlandoregon.gov"
"Good evening, this is Manny. So are we doing a repeat of this morning for tomorrow then? I want to have the officers in place. "
"Will do. See you in the AM"
"Eileen, is the afternoon conference open to the public"
"When you have time can you send me that list of names"
"It's run by SEI. I sent an email with the ROS to you last night? Did you get the logistics email "
"Says no one is there to let them in?"
"No one is out front off of 4th or 5th. We are here now"
"Copy. Will do. It will be taken care of"
"Is this morning press conference open to guests?"
"No. Just trying to get a rough number of attendees. "
"David Douglas Board chair Andrea valderamma is coming to city hall for the press conference -- please allow her in üôèüèª"
"Terri, do you know who is point from PPB today on comms? Can't reach Tina "
"She was up until 4 I think. Natasha Haunsperger is PIO until about 4 or 5. "
"Is that you I see in the zoom? üôåüèª"
"This is tactics and strategy, not what feels good "
"Just emailed you our statement on George Floyd. Pushing it out in 5 min"
"Can you let the Chief see it before sending plz?"
"This is the number I have for the Chief. Correct?"
"I need to log onto my computer . No Resch is on furlough is Davis"
"Tina, should the JIC know about tomorrow's demonstrations?"
"We're going to have a leadership huddle to talk about scenarios for tomorrow -- if we set up a time would you like to join the zoom call?"
"I will reach out to all once I have some info from Pete.       Leadership huddle including who? I am in just trying to figure out what that means "
"Davis and I are available. Aja and Diane can coordinate. Working to get Pete Simpson there as well"
"I forwarded and email to you with a draft response about that he events tomorrow "
"Ive got the mayor on the phone"
"Let me know when I can call you "
"Tina can you or someone be the MC?"
"Thank you. I will send you run of show in a few hours"
"Have you notified media about press conference?"
"Tina you are a FORCE to be reckoned with and it's my honor to be working with you"
"Let me know if you have a minute. (Texting instead of calling in case you're resting) "
"Says they can't see you on 4th or 5th?"
"We need to chat for one min before start"
"Tina apologies, can we reschedule tomorrow Bi-Weekly comms meeting?"
"Chief ok doing daily pressers until rioting is over?"
"I will ask her it may be her or the DC"
"Davis can do event. I cannot. I need to get some sleep. 3 hours a day for last 4 days is not enough"
"Liked ‚ÄúDavis can do event. I cannot. I need to get some sleep. 3 hours a day for last 4 days is not enough‚Äù"
"Please get some rest I'll coordinate with Davis "
"Natasha Haunsperger will be here but would rather not emcee if possible "
"Around how many numbers are on the streets etc "
"We have two major events with over a thousand in one March on the Eastside and hundreds in the other downtown "
"A combination of some peaceful points and some participants engaging in violent acts towards police "
"Demonstration liaisons working with those who are peaceful to facilitate free speech and assembly"
"I think it is advisable to stay away from labeling if possible "
"Hey Tina. Let me know if it's going to be Resch or Davis tomorrow üôèüèª"
"What time is press conference? Chief Resch will attend "
"We're changing presser time to noon. Starting tomorrow. I know chief and MTW and YOU are exhausted up all night. Can you let Diane know? "
"I am available. Was in restroom when u called "
"Chief, Tina mentioned you will be speaking at the presser tomorrow? Just confirming "
"Do you recommend any other partners that we haven't thought about yet?"
"If you haven't yet got him for it Sheriff Reese. "
"I asked, he might not be able to"
"Think we need a statement for council. You both have a lot on your plate. Is Tia a good option to draft? I can follow up with her. "
"Liked ‚ÄúThink we need a statement for council. You both have a lot on your plate. Is Tia a good option to draft? I can follow up with her. ‚Äù"

"079763   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"973559   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"972778   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"247367   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"820408   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"093381   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"I heartily agree with Nic. Thank you üôèüèª"
"Just sent you a press release to review "
"Saw a bunch of the back and forth on Nigel's request -- want me to craft a response or do you want to take a stab at it?"
"Sorry for late text. Good call on staff conversation re statement, that was important discussion üôåüèº"
"I don't know what happened, sorry. Team expressed desire to see language and weigh in, I said I would relay to you. "
"Folks on the huddle - not sure who is most interested "
"Or you could convene a second short team call to discuss? Defer to you "
"Outlined the basic parameters of our thinking to Tom. He is tasking Laura O. She will be ready to start working tonight or tomorrow am. "
"Sonia, can Laura help with TPs? I can send her this afternoon's TPs for guidance on tone and length and have her create a draft. "
"Yes! If you tell me the scope of assistance you'd like I can call her now. "
"Just need her to write a first draft "
"I'll get an email started to you and her now "
"Let me know after you've talked and I'll send"
"She is ready to help and ready for your call/email. I can also help, however you need. "
"Mayor requested town hall bullet -- was adamant. Should I tell him not to say? Or just keep "
"Tom just asked if we know what Governor is announcing at 3. Do you know anything?"
"The chairs office reached out earlier re request for Rachael banks tomorrow and I said I'd find out more. Is it for her to talk ab public health aspects of protests?"
"She confirmed. I told Julie at the county that she can speak on whatever she'd like!"
"Oh! That's so great! Kim seemed hesitant. Nice work üôåüèº"
"Don't want to wake you up -- so texting. Finalizing the Mayor's TPs. Let me know when you can call "
"Now is great. About to head down to city hall. "
"I have Govs office a courtesy heads up."
"Jenifer at CAO says she will take care of the request a noon "
"Mind giving Lauren a heads up saying it will be fulfilled before 1 pm "
"I will draft and we can decide Monday. Have on my list. "
"'Yielded to demands' is inaccurate if he means PPS. Should Tim call him to clarify, or not worth it?"
"Please take out reference to chemical gas in any draft you push out üôèüèª"
"And yes I will have Tim correct "
"Sonia, as soon as Tim pushes out I will push out on social. Good?"
"FYI.., one person shot in SE , Water and Hawthorne but not related to protest. "
"100 protestors at Lloyd ctr. PPB has around 250 there."

"Talk of activating national guard. They can't help til 4 pm tomorrow. 50 people support / facility security only . Tina's coordinating through Steve with the guard to be announced through governors office. But still in the works. "
"If you don't hear from Adam can you go to second floor ?"

"Demonstrators were marching around and blocking streets downtown most of the night. At the height there were about 100. They later in the streets, but there was minimal traffic.       They were trying to provoke a confrontation at shift change with police and were chasing officers around 2 am. Three mobile field forces were called down and leave was restored. One arrest was made for interfering with police and resist. Most dispersed after that. A few still hanging out by justice center.      This group is the same one organizing tonight's event "

"At one point some of them were getting into a construction zone and taking cones and things and using them to block the street. I do not have an updated on any vandalism. I have not heard of any injuries. Just a lot of very tired officers and central command staff"
"Tina, you must've been up all night. Hang in there. Thank you for your service üôèüèª"
"Just since 3...pages. I was at home but will have to do with 4 hours. I think it will be a late night. "

"We made one arrest at 3/main. A male in a car tried to drive through the crowd (not aggressively). Police tried repeatedly to get him to back up and that the road was closed and he refused. Many attempts at compliance. He refused and was arrested."
"The officers did a tremendous job. He just flat out refused. That could be a national story though"
"Demonstrators blocking the street and right of way. There was another option and police have authority to close street. Some may see the driver as having the right to go they. Just FYI"
"The March is heading downtown. Approx. 700 demonstrators. Wells Fargo and Nike sustained broken windows and graffiti. "
"We had an unrelated shooting downtown with one victim. Release just sent out"
"There was another shooting up near fArragut Park GVRT is investigating. "
"There is a walk in gunshot wound victim who reportedly was shot by a protester. He is being treated and released. Details are slow"
"Multnomah county side of justice center has been breached and they are inside causing damage "
"Lighting something on fire in the building "
"Pastor hennessee reached out saying he wants to be involved in a press conference "
"They have broken into Pioneer Square mall"
"All personnel has been deployed dispersing the crowd. Not enough staff for arrests "
"There was the arrest earlier in the day but not since the March "
"I do t see any of you on the JIC call. Can someone join?"
"We are starting to use #onecommunitypdx as a hash tag. Terri has been sending tweets from Chief with positive images. Please retweet "
"Afraid that may be co-opted with force implications "
"Chief talked to commissioner Hardesty about the media info and proud boys. We are working with them to handle the inquiry "
"Aja, two media requests -- one with OPB think out loud and one with Meet The Press Daily Chuck Todd"
"(So we can start working on talking points) "
"Aja too late to send back revised TPs?"
"Tim ignore my email message ! No need for TPs "
"Ok . We need to touch base about your vacation time at some point."

"Evening- is your office going to put out a press release tonight announcing tomorrow morning's press conference? The commissioner hasn't responded to my calls so I don't have an answer yet about whether she can join "
"Lokyee, would commissioner Hardesty be able to join our 8:30 am presser tomorrow? We feel it's critical to have her voice "
"Hey Lokyee -- what is the press conference about? "
"Hope you don't mind if I invite Laura to the meeting today? "
"Think it's worth talking about all the forums "
"Don't mind at all. Thanks for including her"
"Heard this was powerful. Have not watched "
"Tim can you update the press release with the new link "
"YES ! THEY BROKE MY DOOR AND CRACK THE GLASS ! THE DOOR COMEING IN ! IT'S A TUFF DOOR ! OTHER THAN THAT ' TAGS HEAR AND THERE ' "
"All -- I'll leave it to Tim to decide if he wants to keep it, but I won't be on the 10 am call for a week. "
"You have in your inbox my handover document "
"804691   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"402626   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"At 23:15 protestors attempted to breach the sacred fence. After announcing multiple warnings , the county dispersed smoke and then gas to break up the group near the gate. "
"Officers are taking projections from slingshots and are about to go on the offensive and likely clear the park "
"Tina just shared a message to media to leave the park "
"I don't think the talk at Chapman Park worked. Things have escalated. Also, a modified morator/IED landed at the feet of a few officers. The fuse went out. "
"Aja is signing now. Coming to you shortly. "
"I will push out the signed copy "
"I need to push out a tweet ASAP "
"I do not have doc in inbox"
"Feel free to change font to something more serious"
"What is eta on curfew information going out? "
"On the phone with Adam now. Done but publishing issues. Just in English at this point"
"We are looking at Monday for larger announcement re actions. Will brief Mayor tomorrow, want to make you two aware now. Call with questions! "
"We are looking at Monday for larger announcement re actions. Will brief Mayor tomorrow, want to make you two aware now. Call with questions! "
"Just sent you an email to revie"
"Just saw - Dan I actually have time right now. Am reviewing."
"I only have one short break in the next 6 1/2 hours. It just got filled with the PPB update. I'm fine with that, but I will be multitasking while I do it so I will attend by phone."

"I think if the police are going to close off the area around the justice center this should be messaged. We should consider the messaging that we are supporting demonstrations and protests in first amendment rights. We are closing off the area around the justice facility to protect the hundreds of individuals who are incarcerated there. We appreciate the publics understanding. Something like that whatever you guys decide."
"Tim just read me the tweet. What is the purpose? It sounds defensive. Unless you meant it as a new order. See below the original."
"'I have directed PPB to use LRAD only to share information - not to use the sonic warning tone function.'"
"'From here on out, I have directed PPB to use LRAD only to share information. No longer as a sonic warning tone function.'"
"Let me know if you see the difference and which one is best to send ASAP "
"Prep time setup at 5 am for tonight's KATU interview. Zoom info in appointment. "
"Commissioner Hardesty just sent me a text asking us not to have a press conference tomorrow. Can somebody reach out to her staff and find out why?"
"They have not let me into the zoom yet. "
"Been here since 5:30ish. Still waiting for Tina to organize."

"897426   Use this code for Microsoft verification"

"The OLCC approved liquor licenses for sidewalks and streets yesterday. I would like us to find three or four restaurants who are ready to take advantage of this and announce it immediately with my full throated support for this concept. We can work with Commissioner Eudaly (cc'd). "
"She is lead with PBOT. This is a winner. "
"Will do. Sonia: I'll coordinate with you on identifying businesses."

"Liked ‚ÄúThe OLCC approved liquor licenses for sidewalks and streets yesterday. I would like us to find three or four restaurants who are ready to take advantage of this and announce it immediately with my full throated support for this concept. We can work with Commissioner Eudaly (cc'd). ‚Äù"
"Liked ‚ÄúShe is lead with PBOT. This is a winner. ‚Äù"
"I will also be giving input on businesses. I have deep connections with the restaurant industry across the city and my office is working directly with advocates. "
"Great! We've identified businesses too and are following up with Sonia and Marshall to coordinate. Thanks"

"Please clear my schedule Friday afternoon. Ditto Monday morning. Move as many meetings into the early part of the week including the video shoot with Adam. Don't schedule anything over the weekend. Thx.  "
"I'm talking about Friday the 29th and Monday the 1st. Thx. "

"Liked ‚ÄúPlease clear my schedule Friday afternoon. Ditto Monday morning. Move as many meetings into the early part of the week including the video shoot with Adam. Don't schedule anything over the weekend. Thx.  ‚Äù"
"Pastor Hennessee needs the zoom link ASAP. Pastor.mattH@comcast.net"
"168252   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"096622   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"052067   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"Leadership,      Nicole and I feel we need to have a quick huddle to talk about our George Floyd response. Is everyone free at 5:30 pm? "
"I'm on a call with Jamal ab labor negotiations at 5:20. We could push to later if necessary. "
"Join Zoom Meeting      https://us02web.zoom.us/j/4439635756?pwd=Tlo3S2VkeDdndzdBU25ETGxQckMxQT09            Meeting ID: REDACTED      Password: REDACTED"
"Can you email this link? Don't see it in inbox and would rather join by computer. Thanks. "

"Mayor, I spoke with DC Davis and everyone. They know the tweet is live.      We decided to not do a joint public statement.      But rather do a joint internal statement expressing our support for PPB and that this is not an attack against them.       Good?"
"I called a friend, his reaction to the statement ,       beautiful, thank you, and it's never the wrong time to do the right thing "

"Leadership team,      Just got off the phone with Tina. At least two demonstrations planned tomorrow. 6 pm one of particular concern. Aggressive language about targeting police officers. Recommend a huddle today to go over scenarios. "
"Hi Chief, it's Eileen at the Mayor's Office. Wanted you to see this statement from the Mayor. We're pushing it out shortly."

"       'I join @MayorFrey and many around the country in condemning this horrific act. The systemic killing of black men and women across the U.S. has reverberations within our own community. George Floyd, did not deserve to die.'       "
"DC Davis -- wanted you to see this statement from the Mayor before it goes out."

"This is the joint statement from the Chief, 3 local Sheriffs, the Port Chief and Tigard that will go out tomorrow:         We stand together as law enforcement professionals in the Portland Metropolitan Area to condemn the tactics and actions demonstrated in Minneapolis, Minnesota. It is our job to protect life and increase public safety within our communities.  The incident in Minneapolis does not reflect our value of the sanctity of life or the code of ethics we have sworn to uphold. It is disheartening when the actions of so few tarnish the noble profession that we have dedicated our lives to. We are committed to maintaining and strengthening the trust of our communities who grant us the privilege to serve them.  "
